thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Dow ends above 26,000 for 1st time on earnings optimism

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Dow ends above 26,000 for 1st time on earnings optimism
text:
NEW YORK, Jan 17 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks jumped on Wednesday and the Dow closed above 26,000 for the first time as investorsâ€™ expectations for higher earnings lifted stocks across sectors.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 322.79 points, or 1.25 percent, to 26,115.65, the S&P 500 gained 26.14 points, or 0.94 percent, to 2,802.56 and the Nasdaq Composite added 74.59 points, or 1.03 percent, to 7,298.28. (Reporting by Caroline Valetkevitch; Editing by James Dalgleish)
